summary: A bank robbery goes awry and the robbers hold up within a forest, but there is another that dwells here, an ex Vietnam vet. Soon, a battle of survival erupts as the thieves' now have to fight for their very existence.
cast: Bryan Larkin|Hugh Lambe|Bob Cymbalski|Robert Nolan|Mark Munro|Damon E. White|Frank Ieraci|Lee Anne Ford|Bass Stewart|Ramen Zarafshan|Ryan Borg|Sean McAulay|Merella Fernandez
keywords: forest|bank robbery|disturbed war veteran|vietnam war veteran|killing
title: Skeleton Lake
